Name: Glow Chess
About the game: Glow Chess - a variation of the classic game Chess in modern trends of neon light and cyberpunk. Play with a friend at one computer in hotseat mode or fight against artificial intelligence. Each time the game will be built differently - which means that you can play forever! The immortal classic is a game that has been around for thousands of years Simple and intuitive interface Two modes - against the computer or against a live opponent Neon light and electronic music on the background

Meta Description: Looking for information on Glow Chess? Check out the release date (Aug 7, 2018), developer insights from 13-lab, and a complete game summary.
